TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IpcChannel extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel
Public Class IpcChannel Implements IChannelReceiver, IChannelSender, ISecurableChannel
type IpcChannel = class interface IChannelReceiver interface IChannel interface IChannelSender interface ISecurableChannel

summary.span: 提供使用 IPC 通訊協定傳輸訊息的通道實作。

span.span: Provides a channel implementation that uses the IPC protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-class-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-class-note.md)] .Net Framework 遠端基礎結構會使用通道來傳輸遠端呼叫。Channels are used by the.NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 當用戶端呼叫遠端物件時，呼叫會序列化成訊息是由用戶端通道所傳送和接收的伺服器通道。When a client calls a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 在收到訊息之後，它會還原序列化，並處理。After the message is received, it is deserialized and processed. 任何傳回的值是經由伺服器通道，且由用戶端通道接收。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 類別是結合的功能與便利性類別類別和類別。The class is a convenience class combining the functionality of the class and the class. > [!CAUTION] > 設定時`exclusiveAddressUse`屬性，以`false`中`properties`引數，數個物件都可以註冊的相同具名管道。When setting the `exclusiveAddressUse` property to `false` in the `properties` argument, several objects can be registered for the same named pipe. 在此情況下要求可以移至任何已註冊的通道。In such a case requests can go to any of the channels registered. 這項設定會被視為安全，只有當同時使用 Alc。This setting is considered secure only if ALCs are also used. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用設定遠端處理伺服器和其用戶端。The following code example shows how to use a to set up a remoting server and its client. 此範例包含三個部分：The example contains three parts: - 在伺服器A server - 用戶端A client - 伺服器和用戶端所使用的遠端物件。A remote object used by the server and the client. 下列程式碼範例顯示的伺服器。The following code example shows a server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CPP/server.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CS/server.cs#10)] 下列程式碼範例會示範此伺服器的用戶端。The following code example shows a client for this server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CPP/client.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CS/client.cs#20)] 下列程式碼範例顯示的伺服器和用戶端使用的遠端物件。The following code example shows the remote object used by the server and the client. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CPP/common.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CS/common.cs#30)]

summary.span: 使用指定的組態屬性和接收，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified configuration properties and sinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需通道組態屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[通道和格式子組態屬性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)). 通道接收提供外掛程式點，以允許存取基礎訊息通過通道，以及使用的傳輸機制將訊息傳送至遠端物件的資料流。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 通道接收也負責的傳輸用戶端與伺服器之間的訊息。Channel sinks are also responsible for transporting messages between the client and the server. 通道接收鏈結中連結在一起，並且所有通道流經此鏈結的訊息流程之前最後序列化和傳輸訊息。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain, and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is finally serialized and transported. 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`clientSinkProvider`並`serverSinkProvider`參數來`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `clientSinkProvider` and `serverSinkProvider` parameters to `null`. > [!CAUTION] > 設定時`exclusiveAddressUse`屬性，以`false`中`properties`引數，數個物件都可以註冊的相同具名管道。When setting the `exclusiveAddressUse` property to `false` in the `properties` argument, several objects can be registered for the same named pipe. 在此情況下要求可以移至任何已註冊的通道。In such a case requests can go to any of the channels registered. 這項設定會被視為安全，只有當同時使用 Alc。This setting is considered secure only if ALCs are also used. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#41](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CPP/server2.cpp#41)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CS/server2.cs#41)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個已註冊的通道都有唯一的名稱。Every registered channel has a unique name. 名稱用來呼叫時，擷取特定通道。The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling . 預設名稱是"ipc"。The default name is "ipc". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 傳回通道訊息接收，其傳遞訊息給指定 URL 或通道資料物件。

span.span: Returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

returns.span: 通道訊息接收，會傳遞訊息給指定的 URL 或通道資料物件。

span.span: A channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回通道訊息接收傳遞訊息給其中一個指定的 URL 或通道資料物件。The method returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to either the specified URL or channel data object. 如果`uri`參數是`null`，`remoteChannelData`接收器做為目標。If the `uri` parameter is `null`, `remoteChannelData` is used as a target for the sink. 請`url`或是`remoteChannelData`參數可以是`null`，但非兩者。Either the `url` or `remoteChannelData` parameters can be `null`, but not both. 通道接收提供外掛程式點，以允許存取基礎訊息通過通道，以及使用的傳輸機制將訊息傳送至遠端物件的資料流。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 通道接收鏈結中的連結在一起`ChannelSinkProviders`和所有通道流經此鏈結的訊息流程之前最後序列化和傳輸訊息。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of `ChannelSinkProviders` and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is finally serialized and transported. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#22](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CPP/client.cpp#22)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcChannel/CS/client.cs#22)]

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StartListening(object data) cil managed
Public Sub StartListening (data As Object)
public: virtual void StartListening(System::Object ^ data);
abstract member StartListening : obj -> unit override this.StartListening : obj -> unit

param.name: data
param.span: 選擇性的初始資訊。

span.span: Optional initialization information.

summary.span: 指示目前通道開始接聽要求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to start listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不需要呼叫這個方法，以開始接聽新初始化通道。It is not necessary to call this method to begin listening on a newly initialized channel. 使用這個方法來重新啟動之後在通道上接聽已呼叫方法。Use this method to restart listening on a channel after the method has been called. `data`參數可以用來將特定的初始化狀態傳遞至通道。The `data` parameter can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果您不想將特定狀態傳遞至通道，將`data`至`null`。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: public void StopListening (object data);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StopListening(object data) cil managed
Public Sub StopListening (data As Object)
public: virtual void StopListening(System::Object ^ data);
abstract member StopListening : obj -> unit override this.StopListening : obj -> unit

param.name: data
param.span: 選擇性的通道狀態資訊。

span.span: Optional state information for the channel.

summary.span: 指示目前通道停止接聽要求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to stop listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要停止接聽通道上使用這個方法。Use this method to stop listening on a channel. 若要重新啟動接聽，請使用方法。To restart listening, use the method. `data`參數可以用來將特定的初始化狀態傳遞至通道。The `data` parameter can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果您不想將特定狀態傳遞至通道，將`data`至`null`。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.
